content: We have completed preparing dispositions for all the remaining CQL items and have put together a final block vote for consideration on this week's CDS call. The block vote items are all available in JIRA via the following filter: project = FHIR AND Specification = "Clinical Quality Language (FHIR) [FHIR-cql]" AND status = triaged AND grouping = "block-vote-3" ORDER BY priority DESC, updated DESC. Please review and let me know if you'd like any of the items removed for individual consideration.
